mapper.select: SELECT ub.ub_code ,st.store_info_code ,st.store_info_name ,us.member_id ,us.member_name ,ub.ub_year_month ,ub.ub_option ,ub.ub_pay ,ub.ub_etc ,ub.ub_reg_date FROM tb_user_bonus AS ub LEFT JOIN tb_store_info AS st ON ub.store_info_code = st.store_info_code LEFT JOIN tb_member AS us ON ub.member_id = us.member_id
